burn.title: Burn
burn.cardInfo: Select a {syntheticSymbol} balance % to burn. The contract will never overcharge you!

syntheticsMarketAddress.formSyntInfoTip1: Total amount of {syntheticSymbol} minted including the planned transaction
syntheticsMarketAddress.formSyntInfoTip2:
If the synthetic token increases to this price,
you are at risk of liquidation.
syntheticsMarketAddress.formSyntInfoTip3:
If this value reaches 0, you are at risk of
liquidation.
syntheticsMarketAddress.positionTip1: Amount of Tokens Deposited as Collateral
syntheticsMarketAddress.positionTip3: Value of synthetic tokens minted in collateral
syntheticsMarketAddress.positionTip4:
Synthetic Price at which your Loan
Position will be Liquidated
syntheticsMarketAddress.positionTip6:
Maximum amount of collateral you can
withdraw
syntheticsMarketAddress.syntInfoTip1: A LTV of 50% means that for every 1 dollar of collateral, a user can mint up to 0.50 cents in synthetic tokens.
syntheticsMarketAddress.syntInfoTip2: This is a penalty the minter pays in collateral to the liquidator.
syntheticsMarketAddress.syntInfoTip3: Number of synthetic tokens you have accrued
syntheticsMarketAddress.syntInfoTip4: Value of your rewards in USD
syntheticsMarketAddress.userLTVTip:
If this value reaches 100%,
you might get liquidated
syntheticsMarketAddress.toastError: Mint or collateral amount are wrong

form.ltvError: You are minting beyond the allowed LTV
form.collateralError: The Collateral must not to be greater than your balance
